name: GalenWilkerson.GitHub.io
tagline: Machine Learning, Fun Tutorials and Solutions
body:
I enjoy understanding Machine Learning and Data Science methods and concepts and communicating them with others, especially in a fun way.

I also realize that many people from other countries are entering this field, and hope to improve their English along with technical skills.   Feel free to contact me about that too!

### About me:  
I am an experienced researcher in Complex Systems and Machine Learning.

Most recently, I'm more interested in Machine Learning methods and how they can be used to understand data.
However, I have also published in the Human Mobility domain, researching the scaling of trip lengths in cities and comparing results using conventional data to those obtained using Big Data.

See Publications for more information.


### Python Tutorial in your browser

Here is a link to my [my repository](https://github.com/galenwilkerson), 
including a [version of the Python Tutorial](https://github.com/galenwilkerson/Tutorials/tree/master/Jupyter---Python3-tutorial-notebooks),
converted to run Python 3 in a Jupyter Notebook, in your browser!

Go here and download Anaconda version 3.5: (pre-packaged python for easy installation):

* [https://www.continuum.io/downloads](https://www.continuum.io/downloads)  (link on the RIGHT for Python 3)

* start with
> jupyter-notebook 3_An_Informal_Introduction_to_Python_(3).ipynb

I hope this helps :)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
